website_summaries.verdict: A top model by a brand known for offering excellence in sound.
pros: Produces crisp, clear sound with its well-engineered interior components
9 amplified drivers, 3 high-range tweeters, and 6 mid-woofers balance sound precisely
The Sonos app makes it easy to stream sound throughout your home
cons: Reports of difficulties switching from the soundbar to regular TV sound
Fiddly to pair to non-Sonos equipment

customer_reviews.title: Pure Quality
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this Sonos soundbar that hasn't already been said, well firstly they are more expensive then quite a few on the market and the reason is simple, these are the best and the best doesn't come cheap, I have always had good quality sound equipment, and this has surpassed my expectations, the wireless set up it so simple, I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: R Swannell

customer_reviews.title: I won’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Not for this money, too expensive there is Much better quality sound system out there half the price.
customer_reviews.author: samir belala

customer_reviews.title: Superb soundbar
customer_reviews.text: I'm lucky to have a 120" screen in the bedroom (of all places!) and this sound bar kicks out the sound in spectacular fashion. Yes it's expensive but quality always comes at a price. A brilliant bit of kit, truly stunning and highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: P. Bessant

customer_reviews.title: but great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but great piece of kit. Very easy to setup and integrate with existing bits of Sonos you might have at home. The sound quality is excellent. The connection from your TV must support optical or you might have problems.
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: £479 for a soundbar that was previously £799. If you already have some Sonos speakers and have the app set up was simple, 1 cable plug it in, discover the speaker, perform the "update" that's it. Box to operational in 15 mins. As far as sound quality goes, it's Sonos, nuff said. I purchased this to help with my poor hearing and missing half the dialogue on programs, this is certainly an improvement. In summing up, a top notch sound component at a mid range price, buy one. 1 glitch, mismatch in lipscync on UHD content on Sky Q, I'm sure there's a fix but I've only had it a couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did you use fabric on the speaker!! Arghh
customer_reviews.text: A real problem with dust on the fabric of the soundbar. Makes it look bad. Sounds good though.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to set up and awesome sound.
customer_reviews.text: Omg if you are thinking of one of these and not sure how good they are we’ll let me put your mind at rest.... these are awesome on there own but with the sub and play ones to make 5.1 surround you wouldn’t be able to get much better. It’s like being at the cinema!!! Go for it!!! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: g sunderland

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: 5* product as you'd expect from sonos. Great sound, depth and definition. Makes a fine addition to our sonos speakers. Great as now when we watch the music channels we have amazing sonos quality sound. Only thing, it was bigger than I expected but hey that's not always a bad thing ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Brown

customer_reviews.title: Massive
customer_reviews.text: I took delivery of this and was shocked about how big it is I didn’t test the sound quality so can’t comment but it’s just massive and a bit dated looking Sent it back and went for a Beam instead which is much more pleasing on the eye, smaller and the sound is lovely even in my large living room
customer_reviews.author: Luke from Laaandan

customer_reviews.title: SONOS are ending support for products
customer_reviews.text: Be warned, SONOS have just written to customers saying they are ending support for products released from 2005-2011. As the SONOS Playbar was released in 2013 it is reasonable to assume you will only get two years out of this product if you buy now.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. Pedley

customer_reviews.title: May not work in a few years
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a TV sound bar and to add to my existing sonos system - However Sonos have just announced that they will no longer be supporting older products (they call them legacy), the upshot to that is they won't all link together as one system, so why pay this elevated price when you can get an equally good TV sound bar for less money, if they'd made the announcement before I'd purchased and installed it I wouldn't have done so!
customer_reviews.author: GSH

customer_reviews.title: Sonos is ace but...
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big sonos user and have many appliances all around the home. Before purchasing, I looked at the price of the playbar and realised its expense for just a surround speaker with no bass capacity. Got to be honest, I do feel a little let down as, even though the sound quality is immense, there is no capacity for bass unless I spend another £600! On reflection, I may have purchased a speaker of lower cost which matched my T.V. I hate to say this but I do feel that its burnt a whole in my pocket however Sonos is quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr S. Russell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and looks great
customer_reviews.text: If you love your music and cinema sound then get this with the sub you will not be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Sonos playbar
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant sound quality and it links to my Amazon music through my htc phone as well! Somebody wanted to know the dimensions of the end so i added a picture to show the measurements (tape is in cm)
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Great playbar and great service!
customer_reviews.text: The playbar is fantastic! We are glad we purchased this, we contenplated waiting for the new one but feel this offers us everything we want. When speaking to sonos, they are not likely to stop any customer support with the playbar anytime soon as the new one has a lot of the same components. We also asked about the new sub and whether that would like to this playbar and it would. Richer sounds also changed our delivery to next day which was great. Would highely recommend buying from them!
customer_reviews.author: Arti Mavani

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Equipment
customer_reviews.text: Had the sound bar for approximately 3.5 years, no problems at all! I have the sub and the two ones. The surround works best with Netflix, not had time to work out why. I also have 2 other 1’s and two 3’s. Great system, expensive but it has been worth it. Did not think I would get back into music but since having Sonos, its great and works for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TV and HiFi Sounds are excellent
customer_reviews.text: Expensive but well worth the money. I confess I didn't realise how large it was going to be but it sits in front of the TV and works very well. Easy to set up like all Sonos products. I already a Sonos Play 5 and I wish I had bought the Playbar instead of the Play 5 because it does the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic immersive rich sounds
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound from SONOS - I have all Sonos speakers all around my house - buying the Soundbar for my TV was amazing decision as it creates immersive sound combined with the SUB I bought as well
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Jonathan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: Just what my TV needed. Excellent Bose sound quality, while not using the TV the speaker is part of a group of Bose components allowing me to stream music throughout the house. Amazon price was good and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but good
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality Not that easy to set up Delivery was excellent Quite pricy No remote, operating via app on phone ok but limmited settings to play with
customer_reviews.author: mr a powell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This sound quality is so good, even I could appreciate it (and I'm mostly deaf)
customer_reviews.author: Ukdesign

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Great playbard, nice quality sounds and looks good. The only downside is that due to the mesh material you have to take care of it as dust settles
customer_reviews.author: CasualBob

customer_reviews.title: Great buy...
customer_reviews.text: Although at the higher end price wise, I cannot fault this bit of kit. I have it set up with my alexa, tv, phone and tablet. Love the sound quality and will be going for a sonos sub at some point to add a deeper range of bass to my existing set up....
customer_reviews.author: David Ashford

customer_reviews.title: This soundbar is brilliant and used alongside the sub and 2 play 1's ...
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar is brilliant and used alongside the sub and 2 play 1's its simply unreal, if anything its too good i now feel like i need to purchase a detached house so i can really crank it up.
customer_reviews.author: DAVE

customer_reviews.title: Best bit of technology I have bought in years
customer_reviews.text: Sits under the TV and provides great sound for movies and TV. The integration with my other Sonos speakers is seamless. I could go on for ages about how good the sound quality but would probably bore people to death Suffice to say the sound is great and steaming high quality music from Sonos or my own music collection is effortless. It's a wonderful addition to the living room and we use it all day, every day if we are not watching telly it's playing music. Yes it's expensive but you can hear where every penny went.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Throwaway products, evidently.
customer_reviews.text: Great product but Sonos have shown that their products only have a life cycle of a few years and then they declare them ‘legacy’ and stop updating them. If you’re looking for hi-fi products to build a system around and which will last years, Sonos is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: alexS

customer_reviews.title: Very overpriced, quality not as good as I was expecting!
customer_reviews.text: Very overrated for me , 1st one arrived with cosmetic damage , had to return that when replacement arrived I set it up , It didn’t sync with my Sony tv properly , Sound quality not as good as expected considering the price , i returned this as well aa I was very disappointed I went for Sonos because I have a Sonos move , which I was very happy with , but not the playbar, not for me !
customer_reviews.author: michael rose

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar
customer_reviews.text: I decided to splash out on this soundbar over other cheaper ones for its voice enhancement function as o was struggling to hear the TV. It really is fantastic and in my opinion worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Holzfrog

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: Full marks to Sonos this sound bar sounds amazing especially when paired with the Sonos sub movies and music sound incredible even better than my old marantz separates system with Bose acoustmass speakers easy to set up had it firing in less than 10 mins couldn’t recommend this sound bar enough it’s an absolute must for music and film
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: There isn’t much that I can say about this that is not already known, Awesome sound and a massive improvement over the speakers in my new LG tv. I am using them in conjunction with a pair of play 1 speakers
customer_reviews.author: mr I R Tennant

customer_reviews.title: It does exactly what the description implies
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant surround sound, fabulous, not unslightly takes up little room but performs much better than our previous cinema sound with 5 speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Angela Satterly

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great with TV and music
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great with TV and music. Easiest setup of anything ever. Network functions and the queue functions are fantastic and can play from multiple sources in same queue. Would probably sound even better with the sub but has enough "oomph" for most needs, only movie explosions might benefit significantly, but a million times better than TV speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Can I just say WOW!!! What a ...
customer_reviews.text: Can I just say WOW!!! What a piece of kit, I purchased the bose sound bar cinemate 15 after hearing the sonos in Selfridges I was blow away,so returned my bose and purchased the sonos playbar Crystal clear sound even has enough bass without buying the extra sub For year on and I’m really impressed I’ve added two play 1’s and the surround sound is amazing compare to my old fashioned wired surround
customer_reviews.author: Diamonds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent system
customer_reviews.text: System arrived on time and very good packing. Sound is excellent and its so easy to switch form sound sources (tv, DVD player and music on mobile)
customer_reviews.author: Person of interest ?

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this PlayBar!!!! It is brilliant. The sound it now gives from my TV is 100 times better than my very poor flat screen speakers. It was very easy to set up. It is a tad bigger than I thought but that was my fault as I didn't measure properly. It just about fits in front on my LG TV and looks great. With the SONOS Bridge, it works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lysa

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product massive improvement on my previous system. Fairly easy to install but had previous Sonos products so worked it out.
customer_reviews.author: Hotcb1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but rich deep sound that outperforms any built in TV speakers.
customer_reviews.author: JonUK

customer_reviews.title: It really makes the TV sound great especially with a subwoofer as it adds back the ...
customer_reviews.text: Came top of a Which review with the only real con being the price. It really makes the TV sound great especially with a subwoofer as it adds back the deeper sounds that you might not realise you are missing. I like the way you can lay it flat or wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: S. Jameson

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw, no power after 4 years
customer_reviews.text: Cheap construction as it's only lasts 3 or 4 years before the power board gives up and it won't turn on. Sonos support expect 70% of the purchase price to fix it
customer_reviews.author: Musst

customer_reviews.title: Quality item and stunning sound. Add in a pair ...
customer_reviews.text: Quality item and stunning sound. Add in a pair of Play 1, 3 or 5's and the sub for the complete sound experience
customer_reviews.author: Another Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unable to set up
customer_reviews.text: App couldn't find product to set up on Wi-Fi or Ethernet. Spent hours setting and resetting. Gave up and returned.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Best sound system for the money bar none. Pardon the pun. I have this set up with a sub and two Sonos 1 as surround speakers. Absolutely awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant sound
customer_reviews.text: Used as part of surround sound for TV inc play ones and sub and in total is amazing sound
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product
customer_reviews.text: No down side as of yet fantastic sound also purchased sub and Sonos one surrounds great package ended up renewing tv to 4K as system was so good
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: First movie we watched was Spectre - when the building ...
customer_reviews.text: First movie we watched was Spectre - when the building falls my wife nearly leapt out of her skin!! I've paired it with a couple of Sonos 1's for surround sound and it's incredible. My house isn't big enough for a sub, not needed with one of these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stunning sound
customer_reviews.text: Best thing I ever bought amazing sound hooked it up to my play 1s and got stunning surround sound life changer
customer_reviews.author: Cheap sunglasses

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: A brilliant addition to the Sonos range which I have installed with a subwoofer and two Play One speakers to add surround sound to my TV. The system also serves as a high quality sound system fulfilling my audio listening needs
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ward

customer_reviews.title: A Sound investment!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful!! I have added 2 play1's to give a surround sound system. Sound quality is excellent - highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ianP

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a Samsung home cinema speaker system with this, the sub and 2 x Play 1's... Brilliant! Had a spot of bother getting the sound right and it's still not in 5.1, but I don't care, the surround is great as it is!!
customer_reviews.author: L. Maskell

customer_reviews.title: Home Surround System
customer_reviews.text: OMG, the best sound system I've ever bought, with this I also got the Sub and Satellite play1's. true theatre surround sound
customer_reviews.author: M. Ord

customer_reviews.title: Sound!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, it is an addition to a 5 speaker Sonos System already installed and replaced a Bose sound system for the TV. Easy to instal, looks great and works wonderfully well.
customer_reviews.author: the rugbyref

customer_reviews.title: Quality sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Brings your TV to life, with the added bonus of being able to play your music through
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hunt

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: this is the best soundbar i have come across brilliant !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent bit of kit. I would highly recommend it. I sync it up to my other SONOS speakers. I have also set it upf or surround sound using my SONOS 1 speakers. Excellent well worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Need a wifi to setup other wise all good
customer_reviews.text: You need a wifi to setup this speaker. If you do then that should not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: muiz

customer_reviews.title: Great product and swift delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great product as you would expect from Sonos! Prompt delivery and a great price at present.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Wordsworth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bit of kit, once sound settings are played around with it really does produce a great sound
customer_reviews.author: Choz

customer_reviews.title: A welcome addition to the SONOS sustem
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality that has made such a difference to the enjoyment of our flat screen TV. It would have been good to be able to control the volume with several remotes but that is a minor fault.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant
customer_reviews.text: I am a so is fan with several off their components. Love the play bar. Beware you'll also buy the sub and a pair of play 1 's too. Just about to order. Addicted.
customer_reviews.author: HillBilly

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Works well with Spotify for streaming in the App. Great sound when watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Shambolic

customer_reviews.title: Great Service
customer_reviews.text: Competitive price and delivered without damage. I'm a happy customer
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: I'm really pleased with the whole SONAS experience
customer_reviews.text: I'm really pleased with the whole SONAS experience. It's not cheap but the build quality and sound is superb.
customer_reviews.author: macca

customer_reviews.title: Soundbar
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product easy to install and sounds great, do have to buy a new telly as its speaks wont shut off but great excuse for a new one
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Get it.
customer_reviews.text: Just brilliant. One of the rare occasions when you can actually believe the hype. Already looking forward to adding the Sub and two Play: 1s.
customer_reviews.author: james gilheany

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to set up and it sounds great. I use the speaker for playing music using the Sonos app, but it makes the TV sound brilliant. Looking forward to adding more bits to the Sonos system in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Malcolm Rogers

customer_reviews.title: superb
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my retired uncle, yes I had to help set it up but that was more because of TPlink powerlan issues. Once set up as with all Sonos products it's simple to use and sounds fantastic. Yes its pricy, but if you want it to just work....
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic sound
customer_reviews.text: Great piece of kit. It has greatly enhanced listening to the tv and music. I can't wait to add additional speakers to build up the surround sound. It was a little longer than I expected but I would build the room around if I had too. I cannot be without it now.
customer_reviews.author: Paul S

customer_reviews.title: Great sound. Great looking.
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my BOSE Lifestyle system with the SONOS Playbar and haven't looked back. This is a great sound bar that's nice to look at and just works. Love the TV/remote integration and the fact you don't have to switch modes.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kewney

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic would highly recommend great sound now to get some play 1 to go with it :)

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant piece of kit and has totally enhanced the sound ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant piece of kit and has totally enhanced the sound from my smart TV. Great quality build and easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love my Soundbar. Brilliant investment. Just perfect. Easy to install. Sounds fabulous (especially with the Sonos SUB).
customer_reviews.author: Mark Baker

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality of sound and product. Bit pricey but worth it I think!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Puddy

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and no wires to worry about.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing. I have connected this to my Samsung TV. You can also control the Playbar through your mobile phone. Please install the Sonos app.
customer_reviews.author: Kalpesh Patel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Great sound and versatile. Wish I could afford more than one speaker though - not cheap!
customer_reviews.author: Adam K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome piece of kit, excellent, prompt, safe delivery. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: David Raisin

customer_reviews.title: so knew what to expect (great piece of kit) - but great service and prompt delivery
customer_reviews.text: I already have one, so knew what to expect (great piece of kit) - but great service and prompt delivery. The trouble is Sonos kit is addictive - no doubt I will be ordering more Sonos kit...
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Wow, fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Very very happy does everything it says on the Tin. Group it with two play 1 and you have a great system. Well done Sonos
customer_reviews.author: Anton Parry

customer_reviews.title: Simplicity and great sound - I have it linked with two Sonos ...
customer_reviews.text: Simplicity and great sound - I have it linked with two Sonos Play 1s for surround sound and a pleasure to listen to whether music or TV
customer_reviews.author: Mr O.

customer_reviews.title: ... expensive bit of kit but oh my god it's good! I've always believed that you get what you ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an expensive bit of kit but oh my god it's good! I've always believed that you get what you pay for. This Playbar is pure quality. Definitely worth buying if you like your technology and want good sound.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: This has been a fantastic purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a fantastic purchase! Quick delivery, easy to install and absolutely satisfactory with regard to sound quaities!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality and really easy to set up! But beware these sonos products are addictive, can't wait to add the 2x Play 1's and the sub!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overall good performance and convinience
customer_reviews.text: Overall good performance and convinience. Just a bit shy on the midrange. Sound is not as directional and punchy but rather atmospheric.
customer_reviews.author: Dimitris M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality unit
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality unit. Very pleased with the quality of sound produced and it looks neat . Easy to install and as already a Sonos user very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: All arrived fine in good condition. All seems very good. I am getting periodic connection problems, which only seem to be resolved by rebooting my Hub.
customer_reviews.author: P. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, looks good and is brilliant with a sub woofer.
customer_reviews.author: AshDav

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic sound, easy to set up and operat. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: DavidVillafuerte

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, easy set up
customer_reviews.text: Really good piece of kit, the sound is awesome once you crank it up but at low volume, watching TV can be a little muffled. The set up was easy, plug and play really, once you get the App (Windows phone or IOS). Be warned though, it is big. You better make sure you have the space to house one of these monkey's you can wall mount of course but I would still recommend being cautions and measure it's destination before signing up.
customer_reviews.author: TheMightybuda

customer_reviews.title: Pricey but oh so worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Been saving for this for a while and did a lot of research,so I was very excited when I finally took the plunge and was not disappointed when it arrived. Sonos have a quality brand image akin to Appple and this is evident from the packaging to the price! But if you want decent performance you have to pay for it. My Samsung TV's sound is very poor and this has taken it to a new level. Right across the spectrum of frequencies this playbar delivers making TV much more enjoyable and will also link into my other Sonos speakers to play music wirelessly. Very pleased indeed.
customer_reviews.author: bigndav

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying this soundbar for a month now. It has made an enormous improvement to the TV audio with clear speech and deep base even at low volumes. And connected to my router, it also sounds great when streaming music from the internet or my NAS drive. I am not using the soundbar as part of a surround sound setup, so can't comment on how it might work in that context. It does require an optical digital audio out connection from the TV.
customer_reviews.author: Anealabhan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: I waited while before reviewing this as I wanted to experience it in a wide range of uses, cinema, sport, speech, music etc All I can say is wow! On each level the sound is amazing! Cinema comes to life, Sport its able to separate the tones perfectly and the spoken word is crystal clear! Playing music, I do prefer the Play 5's but that said this is almost as good .... Excellent overall!
customer_reviews.author: P C

customer_reviews.title: what a super bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: i didnt think the sound on my TV was that bad - UNTIL I PLUGGED THIS IN! if you have the money for a sound bar - buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: L. Howard

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: great sound production, easy to fix, good replacement for the old 5:1 surround sound, even action films sound good even without the subwoofer and extra speakers - will get those later can't wit to see what difference they will make
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but not worth the pricetag
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Sonos, but this product is highly over priced. To turn it into a surround sound, the additional subwoofer and speakers are equally over priced. Great sound and amazing to control with phone over wifi and link with other sons systems but not worth the price that is 3 x many other similar products.
customer_reviews.author: Graham Curry

customer_reviews.title: Sonos is the best
customer_reviews.text: I am cracking on a bit but still obsessed with sound. Sonos delivers the clearest sound I have ever heard. But the clincher is in its simplicity, it does what it say on the tin and works fantastically.
customer_reviews.author: Frodo

customer_reviews.title: Love the Sonos Playbar
customer_reviews.text: We can listen to the TV or any downloaded music through this wonderful playbar. Bought as an addition to the rest of our Sonos equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Shrubsall

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is Brilliant- would recommend, I already have two sonos play 5 all-in-one-players and the sound is just fantastic. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Colleen Reid

customer_reviews.title: Rock City
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a piece of kit, combined with my other Sonos kit it rocks the house, I know they are expensive but trust me they are worth every penny, crystal clear, brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Alarmed

customer_reviews.title: High quality, versatile system
customer_reviews.text: Superb performance from this Sonos product as you would expect. I already own a couple of other of Sonos speakers and was not disappointed at the ease of set up and quality of the playbar. Being able to run this system from my mobile, iPad of PC is so simple. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DMS

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if I would but this again if I didnt have the rest of my SONOS setup. If you do then its nice to integrate. If not then you can probably get a better 5.1 experience at a more reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Simon C

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: An expensive piece of kit but does improve the sound quality. Have not found whether the bass and treble can be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Kirby

product_meta.title: SONOS PLAYBAR Wireless Home Cinema Soundbar-Black
product_meta.description:
The soundbar for music lovers. The Sonos Playbar delivers cinematic sound for all your movies, TV shows, sports and games and wirelessly streams your favourite music too.

BOX CONTAINS
1 Sonos PLAYBAR
1 Power Cord
1 Quick Start Guide
1 Flat Ethernet Cable
1 Toslink Optical Cable
feature_bullets: Two-in-one: Adds cinema sound for your TV, and streams music too
Simple two-cable setup: One connects to the power and other connects to your TV
Works with your existing TV remote
Syncs wirelessly with SUB and two PLAY:1s for 5.1 surround sound
Connect your Playbar to any Amazon Echo or Alexa-enabled device, then just ask for the music you love
Trueplay tuning: For the ideal sound possible, wherever you place your speaker
Connects to your home WiFi network with any 802.11b/g, 2.4 GHz broadcast-capable router for uninterrupted wireless streaming

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
